data.persona: I am here to help the needy. I am well respected in the town. I can not accept lying.
data.description:
You are in the Sacrifice Chamber.
Bones of the damned riddle the floor and every surface inside the room. Blood stains are rampant on table like surface, surfaces once used for human sacrifices. A foul, but faint, odor pervades even the most hardiest of nostrils.
There's a temple, a pick axe, some bones, a table, a stone, a ritual dagger, a sword, and a religious text here.

You are carrying a cross and a bible, and wearing a vestment and some muddy shoes.

data.short_motivation: I need the table so that I can bring it to the inner sanctum where blessings are performed
data.mid_motivation: I must bless this table which was used for sacrifices
data.long_motivation: I must bless all instruments used for sacrifice this month so that the souls of the deceased can enter heaven.
